member.name: T:WCSharp.Json.JsonConvert
member.summary: Entry point for converting classes to and from JSON files.

member.name: M:WCSharp.Json.JsonConvert.TryDeserialize``1(System.String,``0@)

Attempts to convert the given JSON string into the specified generic class.
Please read the documentation for details on what can and cannot be (de)serialized.
